events.message: I recently received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's request has been identified as a refund case due to incorrect order fulfillment.
Assigning the case to support agent Emily Johnson for further handling and resolution.
Hello! I’m Emily, here to assist you with your refund request for the incorrect item you received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received to help verify your claim?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. I’ve attached a photo showing the item clearly, which does not match what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will process a full refund immediately and send you return instructions for the incorrect item.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate the prompt refund and will follow the instructions to return the item.
We have completed the refund transaction, and you should see the amount reflected in your account within 3–5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure your refund was received and the return process went smoothly. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Since your refund was successfully processed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
